selectedVerses.text: And when the dew had gone up, there was on the face of the wilderness a fine, flake-like thing, fine as frost on the ground.
From whose womb did the ice come forth, and who has given birth to the frost of heaven?
He destroyed their vines with hail and their sycamores with frost.
Therefore thus says the LORD concerning Jehoiakim king of Judah: He shall have none to sit on the throne of David, and his dead body shall be cast out to the heat by day and the frost by night.
On that day there shall be no light, cold, or frost.
